posts.title: Billboard
posts.body: Best known for the Hot 100 and Billboard 200, which list the most popular songs and albums each week in the industry. Offers industry news, events, podcasts, and music streaming.

posts.title: Business Insider
posts.body: High-end business journalism keeping readers up-to-date on economic news as well as interviews with top entrepreneurs. Thereâ€™s also educated predictions, trend analyses, and tips.

posts.title: People
posts.body: Covers all things showbusiness, including celebrity gossip, entertainment news, and the latest on new shows, movies, and popular books.

posts.title: Entrepreneur
posts.body: Find business news, webinars and events, book recommendations, and interviews with successful entrepreneurs. The site is updated daily and even has a magazine for longer-form pieces.

posts.title: Seeking Alpha
posts.body: Seeking Alpha is an investing community which includes millions of passionate investors who connect daily to discuss the latest news, debate the merits of stocks and investment decisions.

posts.title: The Verge
posts.body: The Verge is an ambitious multimedia effort founded nine years ago to examine how technology will change life in the future for a massive mainstream audience.
